data.script:
<script>
    import {
        Box,
        Button,
        ContextButton,
        Offscreen,
        Stack,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Button for="offscreen-once" palette="accent">
    Open ONCE Offscreen
</Button>

<Offscreen
    logic_id="offscreen-once"
    placement="top"
    hidden
    captive
    dismissible
    once
>
    <Box palette="accent" padding="medium">
        <Stack
            orientation="horizontal"
            alignment_y="center"
            spacing="medium"
        >
            <ContextButton
                palette="light"
                variation="clear"
            >
                X
            </ContextButton>

            Well, hello there!
        </Stack>
    </Box>
</Offscreen>
data.title: Offscreen Once
